title: These Thirteen
description: These 13 is a 1931 collection of short stories written by William Faulkner, and dedicated to his first daughter, Alabama, who died nine days after her birth on January 11, 1931, and to his wife Estelle.These 13, Faulkner's first release of short stories, contained the following stories:"Victory""Ad Astra""All the Dead Pilots""Crevasse""Red Leaves""A Rose for Emily""A Justice""Hair""That Evening Sun""Dry September""Mistral""Divorce in Naples""Carcassonne"
author: William Faulkner
